itunes:title: Episode 346 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/20/18 - Special Guests Kelly Stewart and Benny Daniel
title: Episode 346 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/20/18 - Special Guests Kelly Stewart and Benny Daniel
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson is joined by Wager TV's point spread messiah Kelly Stewart to drop all the picks for this week's NFL games as well as "Rivalry Week" in College Football.  We also have Benny Daniel and Greg Lane live from New Orleans from Tickets2allonline...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson is joined by Wager TV's point spread messiah Kelly Stewart to drop all the picks for this week's NFL games as well as "Rivalry Week" in College Football.  We also have Benny Daniel and Greg Lane live from New Orleans from Tickets2allonline.com, one of the biggest ticket brokerage firm's in the United States, to break down when the best times are to get your tickets to the hottest sporting events and why Ticketmaster is a sham.

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
